nodes.text: B-R72 was a heavy loader droid with yellow and red plating. The droid belonged to the Droid Depot in Black Spire Outpost on the planet Batuu. During the occupation of Batuu by the First Order in 34 ABY, B-R72 was stood on display outside the depot, placed on a plinth beside several other droids behind a railing. The loader droid stood 1.75 meters tall.
B-R72 first appeared as a prop within the themed land Star Wars: Galaxy's Edge, which opened to guests at Disneyland Park and Disney's Hollywood Studios Park in 2019.
